title: EDEN CONFIDENTIAL: Jude Law's ex lays love life bare 'in stockings and suspenders'
text:
While Jude Law enjoys watching fellow actors tread the boards, he may not appreciate one production about to hit the West End.

His former inamorata Catherine Harding tells me she is to don suspenders, stockings and hotpants to bring her colourful private life to the stage in a show called Mad Love.

Miss Harding, who performs under the name Cat Cavelli, gave birth to Law’s daughter Ada after a brief fling in 2014. ‘It’s a story about my disastrous love life, narrated through song,’ she says. ‘A journey to the dark side of romance’.

Jude Law's former lover Catherine Harding (pictured) is to don suspenders, stockings and hotpants in a show called Mad Love

Does Law need to consult lawyers? ‘I haven’t invited him, but he’s welcome to come,’ she says. ‘It’s not necessarily one song that relates to him, but more the cycle of my love life. I draw heavily on past experiences.’

Catherine is going to perform a mini version at Mayfair nightclub Annabel’s before taking it to a larger venue. Look out!

Harding (pictured) will perform a mini version at Mayfair nightclub Annabel’s before taking it to a larger venue

Princess Beatrice is engaged to a property developer, Edo Mapelli Mozzi, but she’s guaranteed a royal residence nevertheless.

I can disclose that the couple will live in a palace apartment after their wedding next year.

A Buckingham Palace spokesman confirms: ‘Princess Beatrice and Mr Mapelli Mozzi will live at St James’s Palace.’
description: EDEN CONFIDENTIAL: Jude Law's former lover Catherine Harding is to don suspenders and hotpants in a show called Mad Love - and will give a preview at Annabel's in Mayfair.
authors: Eden Confidential Richard Eden For The Daily Mail
